ch.lambdaj.function.closure
Class Switcher<T>

java.lang.Object
  ch.lambdaj.function.closure.Switcher<T>

public class Switcher<T>
extends Object

Enriches the features of the native java switch. It can be effectively used to implement strategy or factory patterns.

Author:
Mario Fusco

Constructor Summary
Switcher()
           
 
Method Summary
 Switcher<T> addCase(org.hamcrest.Matcher<?> matcher, ch.lambdaj.function.closure.AbstractClosure closure)
          Adds a case that invokes the given closure when this switcher is executed on an object that matches the given Matcher.
 Switcher<T> addCase(org.hamcrest.Matcher<?> matcher, T result)
          Adds a case that returns the given result when this switcher is executed on an object that matches the given Matcher.
 Switcher<T> addCase(Object object, ch.lambdaj.function.closure.AbstractClosure closure)
          Adds a case that invokes the given closure when this switcher is executed on an object equal to the given one.
 Switcher<T> addCase(Object object, T result)
          Adds a case that returns the given result when this switcher is executed on an object equal to the given one.
 T exec(Object match, Object... args)
          Executes with the given args the first case that matches the given match or the defaut one if it has been defined and no other case matches.
 List<T> execAll(Object match, Object... args)
          Executes with the given args all the cases matching the given match plus the defaut one if it has been defined.
 Switcher<T> setDefault(ch.lambdaj.function.closure.AbstractClosure closure)
          Invokes the given closure when no other case matches during the invocation of this switcher.
 Switcher<T> setDefault(T defaultResult)
          Returns the given object when no other case matches during the invocation of this switcher.

exec

public T exec(Object match,
              Object... args)
Executes with the given args the first case that matches the given match or the defaut one if it has been defined and no other case matches.

Parameters:
match - The object to be matched to decide witch case has to be executed
args - The arguments used to invoke the matching case
Returns:
The result of the matching case invocation

execAll

public List<T> execAll(Object match,
                       Object... args)
Executes with the given args all the cases matching the given match plus the defaut one if it has been defined.

Parameters:
match - The object to be matched to decide witch case has to be executed
args - The arguments used to invoke the matching cases
Returns:
The results of all the matching case invocations
